Description: Appropriately named, Glen Willow is surrounded by graceful willow trees and flowering green open spaces. In this well-established community, you'll find everything you need to make life comfortable and convenient. Relax by the pool, or have a picnic on the expansive lawns. Glen Willow is also close to health services, shopping & public transportation. Call for details!
